name: Rubber Brawl
description:
Rubber Brawl is an inflated multiplayer Brawler Royale. Get ready for a chaotic 32-player battle of tires where every bend can be fatal. Keep rolling and bouncing among a swarm of other tires, make them fall and destroy them to be the last one standing!




Multiplayer Brawler royale: 32 players ready to fight in the arena. But in the end, there's only one winner. It’s time for an all-out brawl battle royale until only one is left standing.



Overcome the laws of physics: Rolling, bending, bouncing... your tire follows the laws of physics, but it's up to you to overcome them to make you unstoppable.



Easy to learn, hard to master: Learn to control your tire and improve your skill to gain speed boosts, perform the best aerial tricks and knock down your opponents before they see you.



What a ride: Roll around a cosmic dump and use the springboards to bounce into the other tires. But don't waste time, at the edge of the arena, a storm is brewing and its ring will gradually shrink around the battlefield.
